title: Mageia 4.1 LiveCD GNOME en i586 CD
description:
Mageia 4.1 is a maintenance release for Mageia 4 with the current packages from update medias. It also has a fix for a syslinux bug which prevented some people installing from a burned cd/dvd.

Major new features
* Updates to RPM (4.11) and urpmi, which has been given a thorough Mageia turnout and cleanup
* Kernel 3.12
* systemd 208
* GRUB is the default bootloader; GRUB2 is available to test.
* Revamped package groupings for installation and rpmdrake
* KDE 4.11
* GNOME 3.10
* Xfce 4.10
* LibreOffice 4.1.5.3
* Experimental UEFI Support
* FullHD+ resolution support
